programme.title: El Corrido Del 8
programme.desc: The family of Pedro, a Drug Lord, is merciless killed. The AKA El 8 looks for his brother to help him recruit the best hitmen in the region and start a deadly chase against those who murdered his loved ones.

programme.title: El Ejecutor
programme.desc: Montana is a hitman at the service of the cartel, his methods are somewhat bloodthirsty but infallible. When the niece of the capo is kidnapped by a gang of violent gunmen led by El Buitre, a bloodthirsty murderer, Montana has to intervene.

programme.title: Live Survival
programme.desc: After escaping a homeless shelter infested with flesh eating zombies two cops discover the whole world is now in chaos. They team up with more survivors and fight to escape the city while in search for a way to bring the dead to an end.

programme.title: Rust
programme.desc: Best friends heather and morgan meet up with some friends at an abandoned attraction. What they dont know is within the house lives a cannibalistic madman. They soon find themselves fighting to survive. They are now being hunted down by non other than the blood wrenching and unmerciful grasp of Travis McLennan.

programme.title: Tainted Getaway
programme.desc: What was meant to be a once-in-a-lifetime job opportunity for Allison Haven becomes a nightmare when she's abducted by escape convict Brock Bremmer, who vows to retrieve his lost money from a tragic past. Little does he know an old nemesis, Mason, is hot on his trail to retrieve it as well, including the authorities who will stop at nothing to bringing them to justice.

programme.title: Resguardado
programme.desc: Daniel was miraculously cured as a child after dreaming with his dead stepmother. Affected by growing up without a mother, a grown-up Daniel will have to reconnect with his past to fix his present and future.

programme.title: Reggaeton The Movie
programme.desc: It's the late 90s and two hairdressers and aspiring singers, a dancing student and a music producer dream of having a successful music career. But, another producer, one whose side project is a thriving drug dealing business, will force them to fight for their dreams of being superstars.

programme.title: El Guero: Entre Luz & Sombras
programme.desc: A man known as El Guero cross the US border looking for a better future for him and his family, but instead ends up dealing with dangerous criminals

programme.title: El Inocente
programme.desc: A group of businessmen use their real states companies to hide their drug dealing transactions. The local police is closing the gap to catch them, but there are no enough evidence to arrest them.

programme.title: My Little Nightmare
programme.desc: After a traumatic accident during vacation, five friends make the fatal mistake of dumping their victim's body. But exactly one year later, Someone or something is back for revenge and it's looking for more than an apology.

programme.title: Botija
programme.desc: Agustín Frías is a noble peasant who decides to unearth a Botija, a long-buried treasure, to get the money for paying a kidney transplant for his granddaughter Karina. Going along with him, three so-called journalists join the search with intentions of their own.

programme.title: El Motero
programme.desc: The Morales are a large family dedicated to marijuana crops. There are two brothers, Edgar, who always helps his family and Gustavo who is envious and does not help.

programme.title: El Regreso Del 24
programme.desc: After beign left for dead, El 24 survives and goes back to his drug-dealing business. But the relatives of his former enemy are ready to get revenge and put a price to his head.
